alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Dawes; Morrill; North Sioux; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 2:42PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...DEGRADED AIR QUALITY UNTIL 8 AM MDT WEDNESDAY... WHAT...Degraded air quality due to smoke from western wildfires. WHERE...Sioux, Dawes, Box Butte, Scotts Bluff and Morrill counties. WHEN...Through 8 AM MDT Wednesday. IMPACTS...Heavy smoke from western wildfires. HEALTH INFORMATION...Recommended the elderly, young children, and individuals with respiratory problems avoid excessive physical exertion and minimize outdoor activities during this time. Wildfire smoke is made up of a variety of pollutants, including particulate matter and ozone, which can cause respiratory health effect. Although these people are most susceptible to health impacts, we advise that everyone should avoid prolonged exposure to poor air quality conditions.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte; Dawes; Morrill; North Sioux; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux
